quote: Gentlemen of die Jury: The one  absolute  unselfish friend that man can have in this selfish world  the one that never deserts him  the one that never proves ungrateful or treacherous  is his dog.
quote_letters: GENTLEMEN OF DIE JURY THE ONE ABSOLUTE UNSELFISH FRIEND THAT MAN CAN HAVE IN THIS SELFISH WORLD THE ONE THAT NEVER DESERTS HIM THE ONE THAT NEVER PROVES UNGRATEFUL OR TREACHEROUS IS HIS DOG
